comments.body: I think you need special consideration in this proposal for the root supplemental group, which people depend on today if the uid is arbitrary (by discovery, they know that root gid works for volume permissions).  Adding an explicit supplemental groups that _replaces_ GID 0 breaks those, which means users can't predict what GIDs will work in the container.  We need to make a statement that either all containers can have GID 0 as a supplemental group, or that admins can disable it, but we need to clarify.
Good point, I will add a section for this.
